topic.title: keep-hostname()
topic.para: Description: Enable or disable hostname rewriting.

listitem.para: If enabled (keep-hostname(yes)), &abbrev; will retain the hostname information read from the systemd journal messages.

If disabled (keep-hostname(no)), &abbrev; will use the hostname that has been set up for the operating system instance that syslog-ng is running on. To query or set this value, use the hostnamectl command.

topic.para: This option can be specified globally, and per-source as well. The local setting of the source overrides the global option if available.
